name: Cauli's Night
description:
Play as Cauli as you explore your farm late at night. 
Find items! Read books! Get inspired! 

Cauli's Night is a short game made for the harvest #bitsyjam!
There are two endings, one neutral ending and one true ending.

🎃 Credits 📝

Bitsy  by Adam Le Doux, hacked with Borksy by Ayolland
Hacks by David Mowatt,  mildmojo, and Sean S. LeBlanc
Music by my girlfriend Maddie 💙
